sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: section_title
sub_fields.instructions: This is for displaying section title, if sections are collapsed. It has no effect on front.

sub_fields.label: Background
sub_fields.message: You can set background properties below.

sub_fields.label: Section Spacing
sub_fields.message: You can set section top/bottom spacing here.

sub_fields.label: Custom Class
sub_fields.name: custom_class
sub_fields.instructions: You can add custom class separated by space.
